hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: I build modern and scalable web solutions with Python, TypeScript, and modern frameworks. Passionate about clean code, automation, and continuous learning.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Motivated master's student (M1 CPS2, Jean Monnet University) with 4 years of hands-on experience in backend and full-stack development using Python, FastAPI, Django, Next.js, and modern data workflows.
about.description2: I have a strong interest in AI/ML and automation engineering, and I'm passionate about building scalable, efficient solutions that solve real-world problems.
about.description3: Currently based in Lyon & Saint-Étienne, France. Available for remote work worldwide and hybrid positions across the European Union — no visa sponsorship required.
